title: How to Make a Cake Batter Milkshake

steps.headline: Blend the ice cream and cake mix.
steps.description: In a blender, place the four scoop of vanilla ice cream and yellow cake mix and blend on high speed. Blend for about two minutes, until the mixture is watery and has small bubbles on the top.

steps.headline: Add the milk.
steps.description: Pour the milk into the blended ice cream. Blend again on medium speed for about a minute until the milkshake becomes creamy.

steps.headline: Pour the milkshake in a glass.
steps.description: Slowly pour the cake batter milkshake into a tall, serving glass. Garnish with rainbow sprinkles. Sprinkle rainbow sprinkles all over the milkshake.

text: Blend the ice cream and cake mix. In a blender, place the four scoop of vanilla ice cream and yellow cake mix and blend on high speed. Blend for about two minutes, until the mixture is watery and has small bubbles on the top. Add the milk. Pour the milk into the blended ice cream. Blend again on medium speed for about a minute until the milkshake becomes creamy. Pour the milkshake in a glass. Slowly pour the cake batter milkshake into a tall, serving glass. Garnish with rainbow sprinkles. Sprinkle rainbow sprinkles all over the milkshake. Serve and enjoy!
